title: Amazonians United and Solidarity Unionism
itunes:title: Amazonians United and Solidarity Unionism
description:
Chris talks with Ted, an organizer with Amazonians United about solidarity unionism, direct action in the workplace, and organizing outside the legal frameworks of conventional unionization.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
